about_the_game:
Incredible artwork specially designed to convey our kitty's adventure on his epic quest to save the princess from a terrifying dragon!

Let the desktop of your computer with a unique look!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels and Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080 pixels).

After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Hidden Shapes Cat Realm” is installed, by default, it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\ Hidden Shapes Cat Realm \ Hidden Shapes Cat Realm - Wallpapers).
